name: Burger Smash!
description:
Story: I walked up to Mega Burger at the same time as a dragon. I opened up the door and said ''after you''. He didn't even say thank you. Then he ordered every last burger just to spite me. What's his problem? All I know is if I don't get a burger, he doesn't get one.

Smash Some Burgers! Don't let him eat one!

Press space to SMASH. Time you smashes right to get as many burgers as you can.

Press alt + enter to to enter or exit full screen.

My Highscore: 54
